snippet.title: "The Book: Gunsmith's Battles Echoes" - Gameplay Trailer - January 2024.
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2269000/

The Book is a fast-paced, action-packed first-person shooter set in a world inhabited by pirates and fantasy creatures, featuring a rapid gameplay loop inspired by recent Doom games. Become a stronger fighter by crafting powerful weapons mixing magic and retro technology as described in "The Book".
